breadcrumb.text: Best 9 Christmas Apps Must Download in 2023

page_title: Best 9 Christmas Apps Must Download in 2023
article_html:
The holiday season is upon us, and what better way to get into the festive spirit than with some Christmas-themed apps? Here are our top 9 picks for the best Christmas apps in the United States in 2023. These apps have been selected based on their download numbers, ratings, recommendations, and recent popularity growth. So, let's jingle all the way!

¬†

1. Speak to Santa‚Ñ¢ - Video Call

Ever wanted to have a chat with Santa? Now you can, with the Video Call ‚Äì Speak to Santa ‚Ñ¢ App. This app lets kids video call Santa Claus and is a huge hit with kids. Who needs a long-distance plan when you can video call the North Pole for free?

Speak to Santa‚Ñ¢ - Video Call

Entertainment
4.3
Ratings
8.1 Version
North Pole Command Centre Limited Developer
GET

¬†

¬†

2. Christmas Sweeper 3

Get into the holiday spirit with Christmas Sweeper 3. This festive game offers more than 4000 levels of match 3 fun, filled with lots of new challenges. Light the candles, clear the snow to find the gifts, catch the jumping snowmen, and fill the gift bags. It‚Äôs like having your very own winter wonderland in the palm of your hand. So why just sweep the snow when you can sweep your way to fun?

Christmas Sweeper 3 - Match-3

Puzzle
4.5
Ratings
5.0 Version
SmileyGamer Match 3 Games Developer
GET

¬†

3. Christmas Gift List

Keep track of your holiday shopping with the Christmas Gift List app. This app lets you manage your gift ideas, set a budget for each person, and even keep track of your progress. It‚Äôs like having your own personal holiday shopping assistant. Plus, it‚Äôs password-protected to keep your gift ideas a secret. So why rely on memory when you can have everything organized in one place?

Christmas Gift List

Shopping
4.7
Ratings
Version
engApps Developer
GET

¬†

4. ElfYourself

Turn yourself into an elf and join in the Christmas fun with the ElfYourself app. This app lets you "Elf Yourself" and star in dozens of personalized videos with your face on dancing elves. It's like being in your very own Christmas musical, but without the stage fright! So, why walk when you can dance your way through the holiday season?

ElfYourself

Entertainment
4.7
Ratings
10.1.0 Version
Magic Mirror LLC Developer
GET

¬†

5. PNP ‚Äì Portable North Pole

Ever wondered what it's like at the North Pole? With the PNP ‚Äì Portable North Pole app, you can get a glimpse of Santa's world. This app lets you create and share personalized calls and video messages from Santa with your loved ones. It's like having a direct line to Santa himself. Just remember, he knows if you've been naughty or nice!

Call Santa with PNP

Entertainment
4.7
Ratings
11 Version
From Santa's Elves at UGroupMedia Inc Developer
GET

¬†

6. Scout Elf Ideas

If you've ever struggled with ideas for your Scout Elf, then the Scout Elf Ideas app is for you. This app offers daily photos to inspire every elf during the Christmas season. From quick and easy ideas to creative and complex ones, this app has them all. It's like having a little elf whispering creative ideas in your ear!

¬†

7. Moonpig Birthday Cards & Gifts

Sending Christmas cards has never been easier with the Moonpig App. This app lets you create and send personalized greeting cards. Who needs a post office when you can send personalized cards from your couch?

Moonpig

Shopping
4.7
Ratings
21 Version
Moonpig.com Developer
GET

¬†

8. Christmas Photo Frames

Add a festive touch to your photos with the Christmas Photo Frames app. This app offers a huge collection of charming New Year and Christmas photo frames and effects. You can create beautiful and fun photographs with multiple frames available, such as Christmas trees, presents, candy canes, Santa Claus images, and more. It‚Äôs like having a Christmas photo booth right in your pocket!

Christmas Photo Frames Editor

Photography
4.6
Ratings
8.0 Version
PhotoFramesApps Developer
GET

¬†

9. Christmas Countdown

Who doesn‚Äôt love a good countdown? With the Christmas Countdown app, you can count down the days, hours, minutes, and even seconds of Christmas. This app features a real-time counter, a fun snowy countdown, and you can even open a new gift every day of December in your Advent Calendar. It‚Äôs like having your very own Christmas clock ticking away!

¬†

So there you have it, our top 9 Christmas apps for 2023. Remember, laughter is the best gift you can give this holiday season. So why not give these apps a try and spread some holiday cheer? üéÑüéÖ
